title: Spaghetti Bolognese
ingredients: Spaghetti, ground beef, tomato sauce, onions, garlic, herbs
instructions: Cook spaghetti. Prepare sauce with beef and tomato sauce. Mix together and serve.
author: chefJohn

title: Chicken Curry
ingredients: Chicken, curry powder, coconut milk, onions, garlic, ginger
instructions: Cook chicken, add spices and coconut milk. Simmer until done. Serve with rice.
author: chefJane

title: Fish Curry
ingredients: Fish, curry powder, coconut milk, onions, garlic, ginger
instructions: Cook fish, add spices and coconut milk. Simmer until done. Serve with rice.
author: chefkumari
